wikipedia_page.main: Sir Henry Clifford Darby, CBE, FBA (1909–1992), commonly known as Sir Clifford Darby, was a Welsh historical geographer and academic. He was a key figure in the establishment of historical geography as a subject in British academia, and occupied several chairs of geography.

response: *Sir Clifford Darby (1909–1992), geographer, was born in ResolvenWilliams, Michael, "Henry Clifford Darby, 1909–1992", Proceedings of the British Academy, vol. 87 (1995), pp. 289–306.
